channel.title: Odd thing when starting server
channel.description:
Well i start my server and i get this [CODE]---Qscape by FeaR|-Enabled-| --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30) [/CODE]
usually id only get the [CODE]---Qscape by FeaR|-Enabled-| ---[/CODE]
i was fine and then i got off and added some shops and autospawns and then i went to compile and get on ect no errors when i compile but when i started serv i saw this
when i try to get on i have a black screen and when i type my name is null and my chat rams into my name if someone needs a screeny i can get one
but id think just that code should beable to allow some one to help
any help is greatly apprecieated if i can rep i will or w/e :) ty

item.title: Odd thing when starting server
item.dc:creator: @krupe krupe
item.description:
@krupe wrote:

tyvm i know where to start now i will look for spaces

any idea if this should fix my logging in problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Odd thing when starting server
item.dc:creator: @crzybob4eva crzybob4eva
item.description:
@crzybob4eva wrote:

If you have any spaces in one of you cfg files like this

[code]spawn = 1704 2837 10209 0 0 0 0 0 1 ghost person

spawn = 1703 3374 9810 0 0 0 0 0 1 ghost person2[/code]

Bring delete that space, so it will look like this

spawn = 1704 2837 10209 0 0 0 0 0 1 ghost person spawn = 1703 3374 9810 0 0 0 0 0 1 ghost person2

Read full topic

item.title: Odd thing when starting server
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

that means you have a problem in one of you’re cfg files, or anything except a .java file. I dont exactly know what to do because i’ve never had that error before, i hope this might help you

Read full topic
